scripts.lint:javascript: npm run-script lint:javascript:eslint && npm run-script lint:javascript:jshint && npm run-script lint:javascript:jslint
scripts.lint:json: npm run-script lint:json:jlint && npm run-script lint:json:jsonlint
scripts.lint:json:jlint: cat .eslintrc | jlint && cat .htmllintrc | jlint && cat .jshintrc | jlint && cat .jslintrc | jlint && cat .mdastrc | jlint && cat package.json | jlint && cat tsconfig.json | jlint && cat tsd.json | jlint && cat tslint.json | jlint
scripts.lint:json:jsonlint: jsonlint .eslintrc --quiet && jsonlint .htmllintrc --quiet && jsonlint .jshintrc --quiet && jsonlint .jslintrc --quiet && jsonlint .mdastrc --quiet && jsonlint package.json --quiet && jsonlint tsconfig.json --quiet && jsonlint tsd.json --quiet && jsonlint tslint.json --quiet
scripts.lint:typescript: tslint spec/code_spec.ts spec/features_spec.ts spec/support.ts spec/use_cases_spec.ts src/backend.ts src/bootstrap.ts src/controller.ts
scripts.test: npm run-script lint:html && npm run-script lint:javascript && npm run-script lint:json && npm run-script lint:markdown && npm run-script lint:typescript && npm run-script test:specs
